column5: Ernie Eagle lit in a tree about the time we noticed a small fish floating toward the rapids.  Next we were given a lesson in how to catch fish.  Ernie made my trip better.
Sorry.  It worked in the preview.  Somebody might tell me what I did wrong.  It's supposed to be a movie without sound.
I'm not sure what you did wrong with the vid TG, but I am sure Ernie Eagle is a heckuva fisherman... his life depends on it!
Sometimes the preview is better than the show.  Will keep trying and come back when activity is slow.  Take my word for it, Ernie can catch fish.
